backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the sleep tracking backend, defining data types and storage maps for blink rate measurements, vibration events, blink summaries, and user profiles, with role-based access control via MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-line summaries of all frontend source files, describing each component, hook, and page in the application.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for the design system's color tokens in both light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Vite/React app, mounting the root div and loading the main TSX module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with routes for Dashboard, DeviceConnection, DeviceDataIngestion, and SmokeTest, all wrapped in BluetoothProvider.
frontend/src/components/actor/ActorBoots: Deprecated wrapper component that previously initialized the ICP actor but now simply renders its children as the app is local-first.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Landing page shown to unauthenticated users featuring a hero image, feature highlights, and an Internet Identity login button.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button component that handles Internet Identity authentication and clears the React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/charts/BlinkRate: Canvas-based line chart component that visualizes blink rate history over time, with a 3-second loading timeout and an empty state fallback.
frontend/src/components/device/BatteryIn: A card component that displays battery percentage and charging status with dynamic icons, color coding, and a progress bar based on battery level.
frontend/src/components/device/DeviceSel: A card component with an input field for entering an ESP32-C3 device ID and a link button to navigate to the device management page.
frontend/src/components/docs/ApiExamples: A documentation component that displays JavaScript and cURL code examples for recording blink rates, vibration events, and querying data, with copy-to-clipboard functionality.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: A sticky top navigation header with the app logo and nav links to Dashboard, Devices, API Docs, and Smoke Test pages.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: The root layout component that wraps all pages with the AppHeader, a main content outlet, and a footer.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: A deprecated, always-hidden dialog component for profile name setup that is kept for compatibility but no longer used in local-first mode.
frontend/src/components/recommendation/S: A card component that displays the current alertness state derived from blink rolling averages and allows generating a personalized sleep schedule recommendation.
frontend/src/components/time/TimeRangePi: A card component with a dropdown to select a time range (6h, 24h, 7d, 30d) and a utility function to convert the selection into nanosecond timestamps.
frontend/src/contexts/BluetoothContext.t: A React context provider that manages BLE device connection state, parses incoming NUS characteristic data for blink rates and battery info, and tracks eye state using calibrated light-level thresholds.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, supporting both anonymous and authenticated (Internet Identity) usage, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorBootstrap.ts: Deprecated stub hook that previously handled actor initialization; now a no-op as the app is fully local-first.
frontend/src/hooks/useBleWriteQueue.ts: Deprecated stub hook that previously queued BLE writes to the backend; now a no-op returning empty/false state.
Deprecated stub hook that previously flushed blink summaries to the backend; now a no-op since persistence is handled via localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the current authenticated user's profile from the backend actor using React Query, gating the query on actor availability.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeviceId.ts: Manages a device ID string in both React state and localStorage, providing get/set helpers and a validity flag.
frontend/src/hooks/useEyeRBluetooth.ts: Manages BLE connection lifecycle to an EyeR device, handling GATT service/characteristic discovery, notifications, and parsing of blink rate and battery data from NUS or text-based BLE messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider, wrapping DFINITY's AuthClient to expose login, logout, and identity state to the React component tree.
Maintains a persistent blink rate history (up to 1000 points) in localStorage, with helpers to add data points (including optional eye state) and clear history.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for reading and writing blink rates, vibration events, blink summaries, and user profiles via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRollingBlinkRateAv: Tracks blink rate data points in memory and computes a rolling 5-minute average, pruning points older than 5 minutes on each update.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionBlinkRateHi: Maintains an in-memory session history of up to 100 blink rate data points with add and clear helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base imports and a custom CSS variable-based design token system for light and dark themes, using a calm sleep-focused color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page that displays real-time blink rate data from a Bluetooth device, renders a blink rate chart with time range selection, and generates personalized sleep schedule recommendations based on a 5-minute rolling average.
frontend/src/pages/DeviceConnection.tsx: Page for managing Bluetooth device connections, allowing users to connect/disconnect their Eye-R smart glasses, configure service/characteristic UUIDs, and view live blink rate readings.
frontend/src/pages/DeviceDataIngestion.t: Documentation page describing the API for submitting ESP32-C3 telemetry data, including field definitions (deviceId, blinkRate, timestamp) and embedded API usage examples.
frontend/src/pages/SmokeTest.tsx: Diagnostic page that verifies frontend-to-backend canister connectivity by calling basic actor methods and displaying the status of Internet Identity authentication and the backend actor.
frontend/src/types/bluetooth.d.ts: TypeScript type declarations for the Web Bluetooth API, covering GATT server, service, characteristic, and descriptor interfaces along with request/filter option types.
frontend/src/utils/bleNus.ts: Utility module for Nordic UART Service (NUS) BLE communication, providing UUIDs, eye-state light level thresholds, and functions to parse raw sensor readings and NUS payloads into blink rate values.
frontend/src/utils/bleUuid.ts: Provides utility functions to normalize BLE UUIDs into Web Bluetooth API compatible formats (16-bit hex strings to numbers, 128-bit UUIDs as lowercase strings) and format them for display.
frontend/src/utils/bleWriteQueue.ts: Implements a localStorage-backed queue for BLE blink rate write operations, with functions to enqueue, retrieve, remove, and clear queued items.
frontend/src/utils/localSleepSchedule.ts: Generates local sleep and fatigue recommendations by analyzing the last 100 blink rate data points, using average BPM, variability, and current time of day to produce actionable advice.
frontend/src/utils/personalizedSleepSche: Derives an alertness state (high-alertness, normal, or drowsy) from a 5-minute rolling average BPM and returns a corresponding personalized schedule plan with actionable items.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive parameters from the URL bar.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme tokens (colors via OKLCH variables, border radius, fonts, shadows, animations) and enabling the typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the project's current state and pending feature requests, specifically three fixes to the Motoko backend's 5-minute rolling average: Float precision, strict time-based pruning, and drift-free sum recalculation.
